author: takashi
msg: Return EPERM if the uid is not root on chroot-ing.

author: uschindler
msg: Fix guide to list correct mailing lists. Jakarta ML does no longer exist.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-3969] add tests for delta cas, and fix the serialization. Change the API to have the BY_ID include EMBED_TYPE - so the type is embedded as a feature @type - this makes it possible with a ref to the FS to get the type. Make the serialization for arrays and lists be like a single feature @collection with an array value.  Change some names for uniformity - make all the names @xxx instead of some being _xxx.  Update the expected values.
